basics.name: Julian Kim
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

work.company: Hire Abilities, Center on Disability Studies
highlights: Researched various project management software for use in the office
Edited and organized Webinar videos used in trainings
Worked with staff and created newsletter templates for an ongoing program
Helped to maintain the website and post updates

work.company: Department of Labor and Industrial Relations
highlights: Worked with federal staff to create brochures for the Summer Youth Internship program.
Used Microsoft Excel to organize and interpret data and budget information
Interviewed Summer Youth Internship participants and wrote excerpts about their experiences

awards.title: UH Manoa Chancellor's Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.5 at a Hawai'i public school.
